source: heart is in the right place
lemma: heart is in the right place
definitions: Used to say that someone is kind and means well, even if they make mistakes or cause problems.
To have good intentions, even if the results of one's actions are not ideal.
examples: He can be clumsy, but his heart is in the right place.
She made a mess, but her heart was in the right place.
Their heart is in the right place, they just need guidance.
